data.quote: Just beacuase someone stumbles and loses their path, doesn't mean they're lost forever.
data.author: Professor X (X-Men: Days of Future Past)

data.quote: May the Force be with you.
data.author: Obi-Wan Kenobi (Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope)

data.quote: Every man dies, but not every man really lives.
data.author: William Wallace (Braveheart)
Jimmy Duggan (A League of Their Own

data.quote: Do, or do not. There is no “try”.
data.author: Yoda (Star Wars Episode V The Empire Strikes Back)

data.quote: A wise man can learn more from his enemies than a fool from his friends.
data.author: Niki Lauda (Rush)
